What do you want to learn now?
We are here to help you make the most of your experience with our app.

1.How do I create an account?
- Open the app and click on "Sign Up." Follow the instructions to enter your information and create your account.
2.I forgot my password. What should I do?
- On the login screen, click on "Forgot Password?" and follow the instructions to reset it.
3.How can I update my profile?
- Go to the "My Profile" section in the menu. Here, you can edit your information and update your photo.
4.What should I do if the app is not working correctly?
- Try restarting the app. If the issue persists, check for updates available in your app store and install the latest version.

If you didn\'t find the answer you were looking for, our support team is ready to help! Follow these steps to get in touch:
- Email: Send your questions to eduhubproject2000@gmail.com.

- Keep the app updated to ensure the best performance.
- Enable notifications so you don't miss important updates.
Thank you for choosing EduHub! We are here to ensure that your experience is the best it can be.

EduHub is a platform that offers free courses to users, providing access to valuable educational resources. This application was developed by students Caroline, Catarina, and Rafael as part of their final project for the Software Development course.
